localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
It’s like overtrading taking down Robinhood when Robinhood’s entire mission was to get ppl to overtrade

-Alanis Morissette
blogPost.author: Ben Carlson

localize.full_text:
这就像过度交易打倒罗宾汉一样 罗宾汉的全部任务就是让人们过度交易。

阿兰尼斯-莫里塞特

這就像過度交易打倒羅賓漢一樣 羅賓漢的全部任務就是讓人們過度交易。

阿蘭尼斯-莫里塞特

Today, more than ever, I have seen an insanely high volume of people posting

win is a win. However, the amount of posts and the validity of these accounts
are sketchy at least.

previous.title: Tons of posts today showing closed positions on GME. I believe this is another Hedgie diversion attempt.
